name: Fresh Peas Stewed With Lettuce
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, one pot, salads and dressings
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, lettuce, peas, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups shredded green leaf or iceberg lettuce
2 cups shelled fresh peas (about 2 pounds unshelled)
1/2 teaspoon fresh summer savory or marjoram or pinch of dried

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a saucepan. Add the scallions and shredded lettuce, tossing to coat. Cook, uncovered, until wilted, about four minutes.

Add the peas, savory or marjoram, salt and sugar, stirring gently to combine the ingredients. Cover the pan tightly and cook until the peas are just tender, stirring once or twice, about eight minutes. Serve hot.
